%%pyspark

# Read data from Azure Data Explorer table(s)
# Full Sample Code available at: https://github.com/Azure/azure-kusto-spark/blob/master/samples/src/main/python/SynapseSample.py

kustoDf  = spark.read \
    .format("com.microsoft.kusto.spark.synapse.datasource") \
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "kustoPool") \
    .option("kustoCluster", "https://asadataexplorer801102.asaworkspace801102.kusto.azuresynapse.net") \
    .option("kustoDatabase", "sales") \
    .option("kustoQuery", "SalesTelemetry | where Url startswith '/product/search'") \
    .load()

display(kustoDf)

%%pyspark

kustoDf  = spark.read \
    .format("com.microsoft.kusto.spark.synapse.datasource") \
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "kustoPool") \
    .option("kustoCluster", "https://asadataexplorer801102.asaworkspace801102.kusto.azuresynapse.net") \
    .option("kustoDatabase", "sales") \
    .option("kustoQuery", "SalesTelemetry | where Url startswith '/product/search'
    .load()
kustoDf.count()
